manzils.text: 50|1|Kba-pha, sapata sanmanita kora'anara
50|2|baram sihamte bismita haiche ye, sihamtara majara paraa'i ejana satarkakarai sihamtara ocarata ahiche; arau kaphirasakale kaya, ‘e'om dekhuna eta bismayakara bastu!’
50|3|‘Ami yetiya mrtyubarana karaima arau matita parainata hama tathapi'o (ami punaraut'thita hamane?), E'i pratyarartana suduraparaahata!’
50|4|Arasye ami jano matiye sihamtaka kimana ksaya karae arau amara ocarata ache samyaka samraksanakarai kitaba.
50|5|Prakrtate sihamtara ocarata satya ahara pichata sihamte seya asbikara karaiche. Eteke sihamta sansayayukta bisayata nipatita.
50|6|Sihamte sihamtara oparata arasthita akasara pine laksya nakarae neki, kenekai ami seya nirmana karaicho arau iyaka susobhita karaicho arau tata kono dharanara phata'o mela na'i
50|7|arau ami prthiraika bistrta karaicho arau tata sthapana karaicho parbatamala. Lagate tata utpanna karaicho nayana praitikara sakalo prakarara udbhida
50|8|allahara anuraagi pratyeka bandara babe jnana arau upadesasbaraupa.
50|9|Arau akasara paraa barsana karao ami kalyanamaya pani. Tara pichata tara dbaraa utpanna karao baga-bagica arau kartanayogya sasyadana.
50|10|Arau okha okha khejura gacha, ya’ta ache oparaa-oparaikai lagi thaka khejurara joka
50|11|bandasakalara jiraikasbaraupa. Amiye'i panira dbaraa sanjiraita karao mrta caharaka; e'idarae'i ut'thana ghatiba.
50|12|Sihamtara purbe'o satyaka asbikara karaichila nuhara sampradaye, raa’chara adhibasi arau chamuda sampradaye'o
50|13|ada, phira'a'una arau luta sampradaye'o.
50|14|Lagate a'ikara adhibasi arau tubba sampradaye, sihamta sakalorae asbikara karaichila raachulasakalaka. Phalata sihamtara oparata amara sasti yatharthabharae apatita haichila.
50|15|Ami prathamabara srsti karaiye'i klanta haicho neki! Baram natuna srstira bisaye sihamta sandehata patita.
50|16|Arasye ami manuhaka srsti karaicho arau tara prabrttiye taka yi kumantrana diye se'ito'o ami jano; arau ami tara gharara dhamanitakaiyo adhika ocarata.
50|17|Yetiya tara somphale arau ba'omphale baha dujana phiraista'i parasparae (tara amala) lipibad'dha karaibalai grahana karae.
50|18|Si yi katha'i uccarana nakaraka kiya tara ocarata sadaya upasthita ache samraksanakarai.
50|19|Arau samcakaiye mrtyu yantrana yathayatha bharae ahi pale. E'itorae'i se'ito, yitora paraa tumi palayana karaiba bicaraichila.
50|20|Arau sinata phum diya ha’ba. E'itorae haiche pratisrauta dina.
50|21|Arau se'idina pratijana byakti upasthita ha’ba, tara lagata thakiba ejana calaka arau ejana saksi.
50|22|Arasye e'i dina samparke tumi udasina achila, tara pichata amiye tomara sanmukhara paraa parda unmocana karaicho. Phalata aji tomara drsti ati prakhara.
50|23|Arau tara sangiye (phiraista'i) ka’ba, ‘eya mora ocarata amalanama prastuta.
50|24|Adesa karaa ha’ba, tomaloka ubhaye jahannamata niksepa karaa pratyeka ud'dhata kaphiraka
50|25|kalyanakara kamata prabala badha pradanakarai, simalanghanakarai arau sandeha posanakarai.
50|26|Yiye allahara lagata anaka ilaharaupe grahana karaichila, tomaloke taka kathina sastita niksepa karaa.
50|27|Tara sangi cayatane ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Ma'i taka bidraohi karai tola nachilo. Baram si nije'i achila ghora bibhraanta’.
50|28|Allahe ka’ba, ‘tomaloke mora sanmukhata baka-bitanda nakaraiba, ma'i tomalokaka agate'i satarka karaichilo.
50|29|Mora ocarata katha paraibartana nahaya arau ma'i bandasakalara prati an'yayakarai'o nahaya.
50|30|Se'idina ami jahannamaka sudhima, ‘tumi paraipurna haichane’? Jahanname ka’ba, ‘arau kiba achene’
50|31|arau jannataka muttakbisakalara nikatararti karaa ha’ba, kono duratba nathakiba.
50|32|Iyarae pratisrauti tomalokaka diya haichila. Pratyekajana allaha abhimukhi, samraksanasilasakalara babe
50|33|yisakale nedekhakai rahamanaka bhaya karaichila arau binita citte upasthita haiche.
50|34|Te'omlokaka koraa ha’ba, ‘santira saite tomaloke tata praraesa karaa; e'itorae ananta jiranara dina’.
50|35|Tata te'omloke yito kamana karaiba se'itorae paba, lagate amara ocarata ache arau adhika.

50|36|Arau ami sihamtara purbe bahu prajanmaka dhbansa karaicho, yisakala sakti-samarthara ksetrata achila ihamtatakai adhika prabala, sihamte desa-bidese ghurai phuraichila; tathapi'o sihamtara kono palayanasthala achilane barau
50|37|niscaya iyata upadesa ache tara babe, yara ache antahkarana athaba yiye manoyoga sahakarae srarana karae.
50|38|Arau arasye ami akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majata yi ache se'i sakalo srsti karaicho kerala chaya dinata; arau amaka kono klanta'i sparsa karaa na'i.
50|39|Eteke sihamte yi kaya se'i bisaye tumi dhairya dharana karaa arau tomara pratipalakara saprasansa paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa suryodaya horaara agata arau suryasta yoraara agata
50|40|lagate te'omra paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa raatira ekansata arau chalatara pichata.
50|41|Manoyoga sahakarae suna, yidina ejana ghosanakaraiye nikatararti sthanara paraa ahbana karaiba
50|42|se'idina sihamte samcakaiye sunibalai paba bikata cinamra, se'i dinatorae'i punaraut'thanara dina.
50|43|Niscaya amiye'i jirana dana karao arau amiye'i mrtyu ghata'om, arau amara phale'i (sakalorae) pratyarartana.
50|44|Yidina sihamtara paraa prthiraikhana bidirna ha’ba, arau manuhe kharadharakai lara maraiba, e'itorae enekuraa eta samabesa yito amara babe ati sahaja.
50|45|Sihamte yi kaya seya ami bhalakaiye jano, arau sihamtaka badhya karaoraa tomara kama nahaya; seye yiye amara sastika bhaya karae taka tumi kora'anara sahayata upadesa diya.
51|1|Sapata dhuli urauraa'i niya batahara
51|2|tara pichata panira boja bahanakarai meghamalara
51|3|tara pichata mrdugatita bai yoraa nauyanasamuhara
51|4|tara pichata (allahara) nirdesa bantanakarai phiraistasakalara
51|5|tomalokaka diya pratisrauti arasye satya.
51|6|Niscaya pratidana dirasa arasyambharai.
51|7|Sapata bahu patha bisista akasara
51|8|niscaya tomaloka paraspara biraodhi kathata lipta.
51|9|Birata rakha haya tara paraa yiye birata thake.
51|10|Michaliyasakala dhbansa ha'omka
51|11|yisakala sandeha-sansayata nipatita, udasina.
51|12|Sihamte sodhe, ‘pratidana dirasa ketiya ha’ba’
51|13|‘yidina sihamtaka ju'ita sasti diya ha’ba’.
51|14|Koraa ha’ba, ‘tomaloke tomalokara sasti bhoga karaa, iyara babe'i tomaloke kharadhara karaichila’.
51|15|Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatasamuhata arau nijaraa prabahita sthanata
51|16|te'omlokarara pratipalake te'omlokaka yi dana karaiba seya te'omloke anandacitte grahana karaiba; niscaya itipurbe e'omloka achila satkarmasila
51|17|raatira ati kama samaya te'omloke topanita kata'ichila
51|18|arau raatira sesa praharata te'omloke ksama praarthana karaichila
51|19|arau te'omlokara dhana-sampadata achila bhikharai arau bancitasakalara haka.
51|20|Arau suniscita bisbasisakalara babe prthiraita bahuto nidarsana ache
51|21|arau tomalokara nijara majato ache. Tomaloke laksya nakaraa neki
51|22|arau akasata ache tomalokara jiraika arau pratisrauti diya sakalo bastu.
51|23|Eteke akasa arau prthiraira pratipalakara sapata! Niscaya e'ito parama satya yenekai tomalokara katha koraato satya.
51|24|Ibraahimara sanmanita atithira brttanta tomara ocarata ahichene
51|25|yetiya te'omloke te'omra ocarata ahile arau ka'le, ‘chalama’, uttarata teraom ka'le ‘chalama’. E'omloka dekhuna acinaki.
51|26|Tara pichata te'om drautabharae gopane nija grhinira ocaralai ga’la arau eta sbasthabana go-poraali (bhaja) lai upasthita ga’la
51|27|tara pichata te'om se'ito te'omlokara sanmukhata raakhi ka’le, ‘aponaloke nakhaya neki’
51|28|phalata te'omlokara bisaye te'omra manata bhitira sancara ha’la. Te'omloke ka’le, ‘bhaya nakaraiba’; arau te'omloke te'omka ejana jnani putra santanara susambada dile.
51|29|Tetiya te'omra strai cinamrai cinamrai aguraa'i ahile arau nijarae mukhata thaparaiya'i ka’le, brd'dha-bandhya (ra santana ha’ba?).
51|30|Te'omloke ka’le, ‘tomara pratipalake e'itorae kaiche; niscaya te'om prajnamaya, sarbajna’.
51|31|Ibraahime ka’le, ‘he praeraita phiraistasakala! Tomalokara bisesa kama ki’
51|32|Te'omloke ka’le, ‘niscaya ami eta aparaadhi sampradayara prati praeraita haicho’.
51|33|Sihamtara oparata paka matira tukuraa niksepa karaibalai
51|34|yito tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa cihnita simalanghanakaraisakalara babe.
51|35|Arau tata yisakala mumina achila ami sihamtaka uliya'i anicho.
51|36|Kintu ami tata eta paraiyalara bahirae ana kono muchalima poraa na'i.
51|37|Arau yisakale yantranadayaka sastika bhaya karae ami sihamtara babe tata eta nidarsana thai ahicho.
51|38|Arau muchara kahinito nidarsana ache, yetiya ami te'omka suspasta pramanasaha phira'a'unara ocarata pathiya'ichilo
51|39|kintu si ksamatara ahankarata mukha ghuraa'i la’le arau ka’le, ‘e'om ejana yadukara naha’le unmada’.
51|40|Phalata ami taka arau tara sain'ya bahinika sasti bihilo arau sihamtaka sagarata niksepa karailo arau si achila tiraskrta.
51|41|Arau nidarsana ache ada sampradayara ghatanato, (smarana karaa) yetiya ami sihamtara biraud'dhe akalyanakara bataha praerana karaichilo
51|42|se'i batahajaka ekorae eraa nachila, yara oparaedi gaichila taka curna-bicurna karai gaichila.
51|43|Arau nidarsana ache chamuda sampradayara ghatanato, yetiya sihamtaka koraa haichila, ‘eta nirdista samaya laike bhoga karai loraa’.
51|44|Kintu sihamte sihamtara pratipalakara adesa manibalai ahankara karaile; phalata sihamta ca'i thaka arasthate sihamtaka bajrapate dharaile.
51|45|Phalata sihamte thiya ha’balaike'o saksama naha’la arau pratiraodho karaiba noraaraile.
51|46|Arau (dhbansa karaichilo) iyara agata nuhara sampradayaka, niscaya sihamta achila phachikba sampradaya.
51|47|Arau ami amara ksamatara balata akasa nirmana karaicho arau niscaya ami mahasamprasaranakarai.
51|48|Arau ami prthiraikhanaka parai dicho, (coraacona, ami) kimana sundara byarasthapanakarai
51|49|arau ami pratito bastu yoraa yoraa srsti karaicho, yate tomaloke upadesa grahana karaa.
51|50|Eteke tomaloke allahara phale dharaita horaa, niscaya ma'i kerala te'omra taraphara paraa ejana spasta satarkakarai.
51|51|Arau tomaloke allahara lagata ana kono ilaha nirdharana nakaraiba; niscaya ma'i kerala te'omra taraphara paraa ejana spasta satarkakarai.
51|52|E'idarae sihamtara purbarartisakalara majata yetiya'i kono raachula ahiche, sihamte'i kaiche, ‘e'om ejana yadukara naha’le unmada’.
51|53|Sihamte ijane sijanaka e'i bisaye achiyata karaiche neki? Baram sihamta simalanghanakarai sampradaya.
51|54|Eteke tumi sihamtaka upeksa karaa, tomara kono dosa naha’ba.
51|55|Arau tumi upadesa di thaka, karana niscaya upadesa muminasakalara upakarata ahe.
51|56|Arau ma'i jina arau manuhaka kerala e'i babe'i srsti karaicho ye, sihamta kerala morae'i ibadata karaiba.
51|57|Ma'i sihamtara paraa kono jiraika nibicarao arau ma'i e'ito'o nibicarao ye, sihamte moka khuraaba.
51|58|Niscaya allahe'i jiraikadata, prabala saktidhara, paraakramasali.
51|59|Eteke yihamte an'yaya karaiche sihamtara babe ache sihamtara samamatalambisakalara darae praapya (sasti); gatike sihamte kharakheda karaiba nalage.
51|60|Eteke yihamte kupharai karaiche sihamtara babe se'idinara dhbansa, yi dinatora bisaye sihamtaka satarka karaa haiche.
52|1|Sapata tura parbatara
52|2|sapata kitabara yito lipibad'dha ache
52|3|unmukta patata.
52|4|Sapata abada grhara
52|5|sapata su'ucca cadara
52|6|sapata taranga-biksubdha uttala sagarara
52|7|niscaya tomara pratipalakara sasti arasyambharai
52|8|iyara pratiraodhakarai kono na'i.
52|9|Yidina prabalabharae akasakhana prakampita ha’ba
52|10|arau parbatasamuha drautagatita paraibhramana karaiba
52|11|eteke sarbanasa se'idina asbikarakaraisakalara babe
52|12|yihamte khela-dhemalira chalanarae asara karmata lipta thake.
52|13|Se'idina sihamtaka jahannamara ju'ira phale theli-heci lai yoraa ha’ba
52|14|‘e'itorae se'i jahannama yaka tomaloke asbikara karaichila’.
52|15|E'ito yadu neki? Ne tomaloke dekha noporaa
52|16|Tomaloke ju'ita praraesa karaa, tara pichata tomaloke dhairya dharana karaa ba nakaraa ubhaye'i tomalokara babe samana. Tomaloke yi karaichila tarae'i pratiphala tomalokaka diya haiche.
52|17|Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba jannatata arau praacuryara bhitarata
52|18|te'omlokara pratipalake te'omlokaka yi pradana karaiche seya te'omloke upabhoga karaiba arau te'omlokara pratipalake te'omlokaka raksa karaiba jbalanta agnira sastira paraa
52|19|‘tomaloke yi amala karaichila tara binimayata tomaloke trpti sahakarae khoraa arau pana karaa’.
52|20|Te'omloke sraenibad'dhabharae susajjita asanata a'uji bahiba; arau ami te'omlokara milana ghatama mrganayani danara caku bisista hurara lagata

52|21|arau yisakale imana aniche arau te'omlokara santana-santati'o imanata te'omlokara anugami haiche, ami te'omlokara lagata te'omlokara santana-santatika ekatraita karaima, arau te'omlokara karmaphala ami alapo hraasa nakaraima; pratyeka byaktiye'i nija krtakarmara babe dayi.
52|22|Arau ami te'omlokaka atiraikta pradana karaima phala-mula arau mansa yito te'omloke kamana karaiba.
52|23|Tata te'omloke parasparae panapatra adana-pradana karaiba, tata kono nirarthaka katha-bataraa nathakiba arau kono papa kama'o nathakiba.
52|24|Arau tata te'omlokara seraata carai'ophale ghurai thakiba kisorasakalara dala; sihamta dekhata yena suraksita mukuta.
52|25|Arau te'omloke ijane sijanara phale ca'i sudhiba
52|26|te'omloke ka’ba, ‘niscaya ami iti purbe amara paraiyala bargara majata sankita arasthata achilo’.
52|27|Tara pichata allahe amara prati anugraha karaiche arau amaka ju'ira sastira paraa raksa karaiche.
52|28|Niscaya ami agate'o te'omke'i ahbana karaichilo; niscaya te'om krpamaya, parama dayalu.
52|29|Eteke tumi upadesa di thaka, karana tomara pratipalakara anugrahata tumi ganako nahaya arau unmado nahaya.
52|30|Sihamte kaya neki ye, e'om (muham'mada) ejana kabi? Ami tara mrtyura pratiksa karaicho.
52|31|Koraa, ‘tomaloke apeksa karaa, mayo tomalokara lagata pratiksakaraisakalara antarbhukta ha’lo’.
52|32|Sihamtara bibeka-bud'dhiye sihamtaka e'i adesa diye neki? Ne sihamta simalanghanakarai sampradaya
52|33|ne sihamte kaya, ‘e'i kora'ana e'om nije'i racana karaiche’? Baram sihamta imana naniba.
52|34|Tente sihamte yadi satyabadi, tetiyaha’le sihamte iyara darae kono bani lai ahakacona
52|35|sihamte srastabihina srsti haiche neki, ne sihamta nije'i srasta
52|36|ne sihamte akasamandala arau prthirai srsti karaiche? Baram sihamte drrha bisbasa nakarae.
52|37|Tomara pratipalakara gopana bhandara sihamtara ocarate neki, ne sihamte'i sakalo bastura niyantranakarai
52|38|ne sihamtara ocarata mai ache, ya’ta araohana karai sihamte (urd'dhajagatara katha) sunibalai paya? Tente sihamte suna se'i spasta pramanato lai ahakacona
52|39|ne kan'ya santana te'omra babe; arau putra santana tomalokara babe
52|40|tumi sihamtara ocarata pratidana bicaraa neki ye, sihamte iyaka eta durbaha boja buli bhabe
52|41|ne sihamtara ocarata adrsyara jnana ache, yito sihamte likhe
52|42|ne sihamte kono sarayantra karaiba bicarae? Eteke yihamte kupharai karae sihamte'i ha’ba sarayantrara cikara.
52|43|Ne allahara bahirae sihamtara kono ilaha ache? Sihamte yi sbirka karae tara paraa allaha paraitra.
52|44|Arau akasara kono tukuraa bhani paraa dekhile'o sihamte ka’ba, ‘e'ito eta punjibhuta megha’.
52|45|Eteke sihamtaka erai diya se'idina paryanta, yidina sihamta bajraaghatata akraanta ha’ba.
52|46|Se'idina sihamtara sarayantra kono kamata nahiba arau sihamtaka sahaya'o karaa naha’ba.
52|47|Arau niscaya yihamte an'yaya karaiche sihamtara babe ache iyara bahirae'o arau sasti. Kintu sihamtara adhikansa'i e'i katha najane.

53|7|arau te'om achila urd'dhadigantata

53|11|Yi te'om dekhiche, te'omra antarae se'i samparke micha koraa na'i
53|12|te'om yi dekhiche, se'i samparke tomaloke te'omra lagata bitarka karaiba neki
53|13|arau niscaya te'om te'omka arau ebara dekhichila.
53|14|Chidaraatula munatahara ocarata
53|15|yara ocarata jannatula ma’oraa arasthita.
53|16|Yetiya chidaraa'i yi acchadita karaara seya acchadita karaichila
53|17|te'omra drsti bibhrama horaa na'i, arau sima'o atikrama karaa na'i.

53|22|teneha’le eya eta asangata bantana.

53|23|E'ibora kichumana namara bahirae ana eko nahaya, yibora nama tomaloke arau tomalokara pitrpurausasakale raakhiche, yara samarthanata allahe kono dalila-pramana aratirna karaa na'i. Sihamte kerala anumana arau nijara prabrttirae'i anusarana karae, athaca sihamtara ocarata sihamtara pratipalakara taraphara paraa hidayata ahiche.
53|24|Manuhe yi bicarae se'itorae si paya ne

53|26|Arau akasasamuhata asankhya phiraista ache, sihamtara madhyasthata kono kamata nahiba, kintu allahe yaka iccha karae arau yara prati te'om santusta haya tara babe anumati diyara pichata.
